channel.title: Work Experience on Kevin Kleinschmidt
channel.description: Recent content in Work Experience on Kevin Kleinschmidt

item.title: Education
item.author: kjkleinschmidt96@gmail.com (Kevin Kleinschmidt)
item.description: .classes {float: left; width: 50%;} .row:after { content: “”; display: table; clear: both; } } Marist College, Poughkeepsie, New York Bachelor of Science, May, 2019, G.P.A: 3.3⁄4.0 Major: Information Systems and Technology Concentration: Information Technology Minors: Cyber Security | Computer Science Relevant Coursework Software Development (HTML, Java, PHP) Data Storage & Architecture Management Database Management Internetworking UNIX OS Systems Administration & Management Project Work Internetworking Final Project: (Internetworking) Designed and implemented a comprehensive network including creating an IP addressing scheme, network topology, and actual command syntax based on the networking scenario provided Linux from Scratch Project: (UNIX OS) Built a customized Linux system following step-by-step instructions that allowed me to gain familiarity with Linux systems and the commands and syntax used.

item.title: About Me
item.author: kjkleinschmidt96@gmail.com (Kevin Kleinschmidt)
item.description: p { font-size: 18px; }      I am currently a senior at Marist College studying Information Technology and Systems. I will be completing my degree in May of 2019. In addition, I am minoring in Computer Science and Cybersecurity at Marist. During my time at school I have earned a GPA of 3.3⁄4.0 while working part-time and being involved in several clubs on campus. I am currently seeking full-time opportunities in the IT field to apply the skills I have learned and gain further experience in the field.
